reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, pretty, and of great quality. They appreciate its weight, with one customer noting it has heavy material.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: This sweater is so soft and it wears well. It is heavier than I thought it would be (which is great - I was expecting a thinner sweater. It looks good and washes well. The flower has a nice depth to it. . I am very pleased with this. Read more
items.author: Mondovan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. Lots of compliments on it. It's not too heavy not to light. Very soft Read more
items.author: sue

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater!
items.body: Well-made, medium weight, very soft. This is a cute dupe for an Anthropologie sweater at a fraction of the price. I wish it came in XS Read more
items.author: SJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and soft
items.body: Cute sweater... runs big but very soft Read more
items.author: Cynthia M. Casey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Definitely for colder weather
items.author: Claudia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Stunning, and Sure to Turn Heads
items.body: I can’t tell you the last time I shopped for clothing anywhere other than Amazon. Well…pretty much. Why look elsewhere? Just look at this sweater! If it were sold at Neiman’s or Saks, you’d be paying $200–$300—or more, depending on the designer. First of all, I’ve never been a lover of floral prints. But this is not your ordinary flower—it stopped me in my tracks. Stunningly beautiful, sophisticated, and unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Whoever designed this piece is a genius! The fabric is soft and comfortable without being heavy, perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Honestly, it looks like something you’d find at Neiman’s or Saks—but at a fraction of the price. Here are the details: This sweater is 50% viscose, 30% polyester, and 20% nylon. Machine wash cold, as viscose can shrink in hot water. Pop it in the dryer just to knock out wrinkles, then lay flat to finish air drying. The sleeves feature slouchy drop-shoulders, with a classic crew neck and ribbed knit at the hem and cuffs. The fit is wonderfully loose and casual—almost boyfriend-like. I like to balance it with something slim on the bottom, like skinny jeans, leggings, or a pencil skirt. The feel is incredible: soft, with a nice weight that’s substantial without being heavy—almost like a beefy yarn. Don’t hesitate to wear it in spring and summer, either! With air conditioning blasting indoors during scorching temperatures, it’s perfect with capris and flip-flops—so adorable! For the price, pick up a couple of colors so they’ll coordinate with multiple items in your closet. You’ll want to wear them as often as possible—and get ready for the compliments to start rolling in! Read more
items.author: AmzPrimeVIP

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sweater with big flower
items.body: Pretty and soft fabric Read more
items.author: Luanne Holmgren

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Dark Grey, Apricot, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
